example.eg: This model is a representation of what the new city centre will look like, once all the building work has been completed.
example.egtrans: 这个模型是新城市中心完全建成后样子的雕像。

example.eg: The artist's representation of woman was abstract, to say the least.
example.egtrans: 至少可以说，艺术家对女人的描绘是抽象的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 表现形式, 表现, 描绘

example.eg: James's representation of what happened was very different from Ian's.
example.egtrans: 詹姆士和伊安两人对发生之事的陈述非常不同。

example.eg: Rebecca's job was the representation of the company's interests in India.
example.egtrans: 蕾贝卡的工作就是代表公司在印度的利益。

dsense.name: representation
dsense.guideword: often plural (attempt to influence) (因有代表团或有人脉而拥有的话语权)

example.eg: The human rights group made representations to the authorities on behalf of the asylum seeker.
Though we had spoken many times, when I saw him I realized that my mental representation of him was inaccurate.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如实表现, 如实摹写, 如实表达
自我辩护，自行辩护，自辩
